member.name: T:Elastic.Apm.EntityFramework6.Ef6Interceptor
member.summary:
An interceptor that automatically creates spans for DB operations executed by Entity Framework 6 (EF6) on behalf of the application. See
.NET Agent documentation on how to set up auto instrumentation for Entity Framework 6

member.name: M:Elastic.Apm.EntityFramework6.Ef6Interceptor.CreateImplIfReadyAndNoConflict
member.summary: DB spans can be created only when there's a current transaction which in turn means agent singleton instance should already be created. Also checks for competing instrumentation. If SqlClient already instrumented, it'll return null, so the interceptor won't create duplicate spans
